s: Showcase your branding, tell your unique story, and earn trust with shoppers. Only brands with a pending or registered trademark can create a Brand Store on Amazon. New-to-brand shoppers who visited a Store were 62.7% more likely to purchase compared to those who didn't visit a Store.

13 hours ago - Amazon owned 34 private-label brands as of 2019. These brands account for 0.15% of Amazon's global sales, whereas the average for other large retailers is 18%. Other Amazon retail brands include Presto!, Mama Bear, and Amazon Essentials.
